name: Valerie
text: Horrible service as usual. We haven't ordered from Pizza Hut in years due to their service. We decided to give them another try. We ordered a pickup order. They said it would be ready in 20 minutes. My husband spent 35 more minutes waiting in the parking lot for our order. Never again!

name: Melissa Chafin
text: Bypass this location if you know what‚Äôs good for you.  Every time I order my pizza is cold when delivered and something is always wrong or missing.  I keep giving them chances as my son loves Pizza Hut - but after today  I‚Äôll never waste my money here again.  They suck and don‚Äôt care.

text: I ordered online. First, they called me after I placed my order to say that they were out of mushrooms. I told them to give me spinach instead. When I arrived for curbside pickup, I had to call despite the app saying the pizza was ready. ‚Ä¶More

text: I just placed an order online and I didnt receive my 50% off as advertised on the site. I called the store and was told they couldn't do anything about it. It shouldn't be advertised if it doesn't work.

text: Its a decent store. The ppl are nice for the most part. And the pizza on the rare occasion that i get it is.. pretty good..

text: Place my order around 8pm to be picked up around 10:30 pm. I walked in and the manager was so sweet and gave me free cheese sticks for me having to wait a couple minutes. She was awesome!

name: robin romero
text: I love ordering from pizza hut! The driver, Brad, is awesome!! He‚Äôs by far the most friendliest guy ever!! My food is always hot and fresh and I get it in the promised time! This guy needs a promotion or something üòÅüòÅ

name: Shawn Romero
text: Pizza hut has really stepped its game up. Orders have been right and our regular delivery guy, Brad, makes the experience feel more personal rather than just a delivery. I‚Äôm literally waiting for a few pizzas as I write, and I know Brad will have me laughing.

text: I ordered deep pan pizza, 1/2 pepperoni, 1/2 supreme. Was not pan pizza when I got home with it and the supreme side did not look like it went through the oven all the way. Lot to be desired

text:
Order was wrong (ordered online), pizza was cold 1.3 miles away. Called and they offered a free pizza on next order! How about this order?
A terrible experience.

text: I think Pizza Hut taste better then the other pizza deliveries. My husband and I are regulars. We never have an issue. We also love our regular delivery guy Brad! Brad is always curious and friendly!

text: Called in order. Medium pepperoni and garlic knots. Drove 20 minutes to get there. Paid and still waited an hour. Nasty floors inside. No one seemed to know what they was doing. I will be a Papa-Johns customer from now on.

text: My food is always on time and delicious. The drivers are always super nice and professional. Carry out needs a little work with their attitudes, but the food is worth it and I order more delivery anyways so as long as the drivers keep rocking I will be happy!
